A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Can I give \"Star Wars The Last Jedi\" zero stars? Because I would; really\, the Critic consensus is nuts. I don't see how Star Wars TLJ doesn't completely ruin Star Wars for big fans of the story/series. It certainly did for me; it managed to do what not even Episodes 1-3 could do. \n\nI worried when George Lucas sold Star Wars to Disney that the story itself would be the biggest loser. When Episode 7 came out\, I was pleasantly surprised\, even with the changes they went with. With Episode 8\, all my fears were realized. They ruined Luke Skywalker\, who was the eternal optimist and the character holes are unacceptable for a story with this much rich Canon and history. Thanks for ruining Star Wars\, Disney. I don't see how I could bother seeing Episode 9 when it comes out. I'm going to pretend Star Wars stopped with Episode 6 and George Lucas.
